title: Upland spot cotton price in the U.S. 1990 to 2018
yAxis: Price per pound in U.S. cents
summary: In general Price per pound in U.S. cents has rose over the Year.

Price per pound in U.S. cents is roughly constant from 2004 to 2009, rapidly increasing from 2009 to 2011, slightly decreasing from 2011 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2016, and lastly slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2011 and 2012.
The highest Price per pound in U.S. cents, of value 132.6 was reached at Year 2011
The lowest Price per pound in U.S. cents, of value 47.35 was reported at Year 2005
